snippet.title: First came the artists, then came the hackers: The strange history of London's own Silicon Valley
snippet.description: London is creating a wave of new tech startups that are finding inspiration in regenerating a crumbling Dickensian district of the historic city.

snippet.title: The IT consultant's eternal question: 'Who is the client?'
snippet.description: It's often difficult for an IT consultant to determine who the true client really is. Rick Freedman offers advice and shares his rules of engagement.

snippet.title: Lessons in leadership: What kind of a leader are you?
snippet.description: In an interview you might be asked, "What kind of leader are you?" Is there one right answer to this question? Ilya Bogorad looks at the possible replies and what they mean.
